mapper.insert: INSERT INTO uap_menu_resource(id, parent_id, code, name, path, level, children, uri, icon, module_id, sequence, created_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{parentId}, #{code}, #{name}, #{path}, #{level}, #{children}, #{uri}, #{icon}, #{moduleId}, #{sequence}, #{createdTime})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT umr.* FROM uap_menu_resource umr INNER JOIN uap_module um ON umr.module_id = um.module_id WHERE um.type > 0 ORDER BY umr.level, umr.sequence
SELECT * FROM uap_menu_resource WHERE parent_id = #{id} ORDER BY sequence
SELECT * FROM uap_menu_resource WHERE module_id = #{moduleId} AND level = #{level} ORDER BY sequence
mapper.update:
UPDATE uap_menu_resource
name = #{name},
uri = #{uri},
icon = #{icon},
description = #{description},
sequence = #{sequence},
WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE uap_menu_resource SET children = children + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE uap_menu_resource SET children = children - 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM uap_role_authority WHERE resource_id = #{menuId} AND type = #{type}
DELETE FROM uap_user_authority WHERE resource_id = #{menuId} AND type = #{type}
